data/events_fleet.xml$/FTL/eventList[@na: You are unsuccessful in escaping the Elite. You prepare for battle.
You are unsuccessful in escaping the Elite. You prepare for battle.
You manage to outrun the fleet ship by some odds. You take a moment to catch your breath.
By some odds, the Elite is indifferent enough to accept your ID and allow you through. You aren't sure how long until they realize what you've done, so you better get away quickly.

data/events_fleet.xml$/FTL/ship/destroye: You've managed to defeat the fleet ship, but you hardly have enough time to salvage more than a single fuel canister.
data/events_fleet.xml$/FTL/event[@name=\: Though the background ships suggest heavy Rebel presence, not many Elites linger. It appears they merely function as carriers for the massive fleet of Auto-ships now swarming towards you. Uh oh...
Continue...
